definition: to pass through a country's territory/transit
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
things change with the passage of time (idiom)
The issue is in the past, and the situation has changed (idiom)./It is water under the bridge.

sentences.english: Things change and friends leave. And life doesn't stop for anybody.
sentences.chinese: 事過境遷，物是人非，不因任何人停留。

sentences.english: I am a transit passenger going to London.
sentences.chinese: 我是去倫敦的過境旅客。

sentences.english: The whole matter is dead and buried and I don't want you to mention it again.
sentences.chinese: 整件事已經事過境遷了，我不希望你再提起來。

sentences.english: Why do you apply for American transit visa?
sentences.chinese: 你辦美國過境簽證的理由是什麼？

sentences.english: Without Customs approval, no persons passing through the territory may leave in the territory the articles they bring in.
sentences.chinese: 過境人員未經海關批准，不得將其所帶物品留在境內。

sentences.english: Our ship was requested to clear the customs and pay the due tolls.
sentences.chinese: 要求我船辦理結關手續，付清過境費。

sentences.english: A passing planet is the cause of disaster, and there will be no escape for mankind.
sentences.chinese: 一顆過境的行星是釀災難的首惡，類無處可逃。

sentences.english: Goods sold to outbound or transit passengers by the tax-free shops set up according to the act.
sentences.chinese: 三依法設立之免稅商店銷售與過境或出境旅客之貨物。

sentences.english: During the passage of a thunderstorm pressure has pronounced change.
sentences.chinese: 在雷暴過境時，氣壓有着明顯變化。

sentences.english: Many states in the path of Irene declared disasters.
sentences.chinese: 艾琳過境處許多州宣佈進入災難狀態。

sentences.english: But the past is, well, it's past.
sentences.chinese: 但是它畢竟會時過境遷。

sentences.english: Is this the interline transfer counter?
But this time was different. I knew I did not want the baby.
sentences.chinese: 但時過境遷，我知道這次是我自己不想要這個孩子。

sentences.english: Check to see if you require visas for the country or countries you are visiting or transiting.
sentences.chinese: 查詢您是否需要獲得到訪或過境的國家的簽證。

sentences.english: But times have changed, and the Web is now big business.
sentences.chinese: 事過境遷，現在的互聯網業已是一個新形的產業。

definition: to cross a barrier/to get through (an ordeal)/to pass (a test)/to reach (a standard)
(to take) a turn for the better/to change planes
to enter or exit/to go through
a pass (authority to enter)/a laissez-passer or safe conduct
to clear customs/(gaming) to finish (a game, a level, a stage, etc)
to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
